description: A collection of show/hide fields behavior objects.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the ShowHideFieldsBehavior.
methods.name: count

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new ShowHideFieldsBehavior (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.description: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehaviors within the specified range.

parameters.description: The ShowHideFieldsBehavior, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ShowHideFieldsBehavior, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The ShowHideFieldsBehavior, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ShowHideFieldsBehavior, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the ShowHideFieldsBehavior that follows the desired ShowHideFieldsBehavior.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior whose index follows the specified ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.

parameters.description: The ShowHideFieldsBehavior whose index comes before the desired ShowHideFieldsBehavior.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every ShowHideFieldsBehavior in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ShowHideFieldsBehavior.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the ShowHideFieldsBehavior with the specified index.

name: ShowHideFieldsBehaviors
